title: The cost of acquisition of land for the green belt, around the Hazardous Chemical Industries will be borne by the Industry / Industry Association
clause_text: The cost of acquisition of land for the green belt, around the Hazardous Chemical Industries will be borne by the Industry / Industry Association. The private land owner will be given Transfer of Development Rights based on FSI for the present land usage. The cost of acquisition to be borne by industry will be exclusive of the value of TDR.
section: Development around Hazardous Industries (Chemical Zone Areas)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
